The installation of the charging infrastructure (expansion level D according to SIA 2060) as well as the entire operation is carried out by the Concessionaires taken over. At location no. 4, both the installation of the basic infrastructure and the charging stations are carried out by the concessionaire.<br> For the occupancy of public parking spaces and the use of the basic infrastructure financed by the municipality For network development, those offering the community pay a concession fee in the form of an annual site rental.<br> The detailed catalog of requirements can be found in documents B Requirements specification, C Offer form and D Description and specifications of the locations.<br> Realization and Operation of public charging infrastructure<br> With this tender, the municipality of Richterswil grants concessions for the realization and the operation of public charging stations in municipal parking lots. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ENERGY WATER BERN. Summary: Ebp-555_Procurement of Vehicles. Description: This tender will be used to procure commercial vehicles and passenger vehicles (cars) in various categories. The procurement item also includes services such as vehicle registration, short training upon handover, etc Maintenance for at least 5 years (service package), replacement vehicles as needed and a warranty period of at least 5 years. The vehicles to be procured will be primarily for urban use (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations used. The vehicles are purchased from ewb (not leased) and should have a useful life of at least five (5) years. The charging infrastructure for electric vehicles is excluded from this tender. They are advertised in the section 6.6 of the specifications. We are looking for a minimum of one contractual partner (= 1 contractual partner for all 3 lots), or a maximum of three (3) contractual partners (i.e. one contractual partner per lot with all vehicle categories required therein). This means that up to three lots can be offered. Main CPV: 34000000 means of transport and products for transport purposes. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Summary: Implementation of an Iot Infrastructure for Building Management (M348ti) Electrical Installations Mandate. Description: Electrical installation services<br> Estimate: CHF 579,000.-<br> The Energy Department of the City of Geneva (hereinafter abbreviated by ENE) acts to maintain and optimize technical installations and reduce the energy consumption of the built heritage of the City of Geneva. In the as part of a loan granted by the City of Geneva for the development of loT projects, ENE wants to set up an loT network based mainly on LoRa technology and covering the entire value chain, i.e. sensors, the LoRa network, data processing and visualization collected. ENE already manages some 400 installed sensors today and plans to deploy more than 1,500 as part of this project. A service provider is being sought to set up and manage this future LoT network as well as to promote and present the data collected.<br> The project covers the establishment of a LoT network using LoRa technology for the recording and processing of data generated by sensors deployed in buildings in the territory of the City of Geneva. The project includes the following elements:<br> * Provision of a LoRa service based on an existing network with geographical coverage covering the territory of the City of Geneva and neighboring municipalities;<br> * The supply and installation of sensors ensuring the recording and sending of data (temperatures, humidity, energy, water, gas, alarms, etc.);<br> * Implementation of interfaces Nec.... Summary: N02, Secondo Tubo San Gottardo (2tg Tube North and Galleria Di Airolo) and N02 Risanamento Primo Tubo San Gottardo (1tg Tube South), Bsa Lot 8001 - Structural Facilities. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment for the second tube, known as the North Tube, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which forms an integral part of the Gotthard system.<br> Main CPV: 44112220 Raised floors. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Published Date: 2025-10-23. Closing Date: 2026-03-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: As part of this project, vacuum chambers for the new HIMB beamline at the PSI proton facility are to be manufactured. The fabrication of vacuum chambers with dimensions exceeding 3 m in height, 1 m in width, and 2 m in length should include internal welding in order to ensure compatibility with vacuum performance requirements. At the time of the conclusion of the contract, the LUKS decides whether the devices by Buy, can be obtained by rental/purchase or rent.<br> With your offer, the provider submits extensive solution concepts for the structure, operation and safety for the printers and MFP at all main and subordinates of the LUK, with roll-out until June 30, 2026.<br> That with the service provider SLA to be locked up includes all activities from acceptance, labeling and inventory to the right delivery and commissioning of the devices procured via the framework contract, the on-site support, repair services, the proactive maintenance, the Special maintenance of the important devices and the SPOC. Optionally, the SLA also includes the existing label printers and all associated activities.<br> In the knowledge that the joint development of such a comprehensive procurement and roll-out plan and the definition of on the LUKS Wing .... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: UNIVERSITY OF BERN, INSTITUTE FOR TISSUE MEDICINE AND PATHOLOGY (IGMP). Summary: Procurement of a Scanning Environment for Object Carriers. Description: The IGMP requires a scanner environment including suitable software, which digitized 1200 object carriers every day within six hours and supports all object types used in the institute. The output format must be compatible with Halo AP (preferred DICOM) to ensure the connection to the BMS from Indica Labs operated in the AWS cloud and ensure data protection-compliant upload. The slides generated should offer sufficient image quality and resolution both for the digital assessment by the medical profession and for the use of analysis algorithms. Since the scanner operation takes place in the diagnostic environment, CE-IVDR certification is required; In addition, the solution must meet the IT basic protection requirements of the University of Bern, especially with regard to software updates for at least four years (desired system life for ten years). The user interface is said to be intuitive in German so that laboratory staff can carry out simple error loops independently without a technical background. Installation, training and subsequent support must be paid at the location of the IGMP. Finally, D .... Published Date: 2025-08-04. Closing Date: 2025-09-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR STREET ASTRA DEPARTMENT OF STRASSEN INFRASTRUCTURE -OST -F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Secondo Tubo San Gottardo (gtg Rhre Nord and Galleria Di Airolo) and N02, Ep 1tg (gtg Tube South), Bsa-los 3302-flaps Ventilation System. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard Strassentunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, takes place from 2027 to 2030, partly in parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the tube north in oncoming, the existing tube, which is referred to as tube south. The structural renovation is scheduled for 2030 to 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the tube south is completely dismantled due to its age. This is followed by the structural renovation and the BSA new equipment. In the final state, the GTG is operated at a speed of 80 km/h in the direction of direction (a lane plus breakdown strip per tube). A block of a tube will occur again and again for maintenance and event reasons. <br> Main CPV: 31720000 electromechanical equipment. Published Date: 2025-08-04. Closing Date: 2025-09-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: HFR | FRIBORG HOSPITAL - FREIBURGER SPITAL. Summary: Switching Contract on the Ultrasound Park of the Friborg Hospital (Hfr). Description: The Friborg Hospital (HFR) is the public hospital in the canton of Friborg. It brings together several sites spread over the Friborg territory, offering a wide range of acute care, specialized medicine and ambulatory services. Its mission is to ensure the population Quality management while valuing innovation, training and interdisciplinary collaboration.<br> As part of its 2030 strategy, the Friborg Hospital (HFR) aims to strengthen its network operating model, guaranteeing optimal quality of care for the whole of The Friborg population. In order to meet contemporary challenges, such as the aging of the population, the increase in chronic diseases, and the rapid evolution of medicine, the HFR has decided to conclude a framework contract of a maximum duration of 5 years (60 months) on a part (approx. 70 objects) of its ultrasound park, all sites combined.<br> The purpose of this framework contract is to acquire ultrasonic equipment, essential for the diagnosis and patient monitoring in various hospital services. For the sake of flexibility and responsiveness, the HFR wishes select Three tenderers who will be the respondents for all future ultrasound orders during this period, in accordance with article 25, paragraph 5 of the 2019 AIMP.<br> This strategic partnership aims to ensure continuity of care and technological innovation within the HFR, e.... B05_TOTODOK_WFZ-ED-IW_AVA) The AVA is getting old (1st Transportation 01.11.1998) and is to be replaced by a modern, with comparable attachment and structure.<br> Main CPV: 34134100 Platform
